name: jovezhong-sak
description: Jove's Skills and Automation Kit - browser automation and LinkedIn analytics tools for Claude Code

plugins.name: linkedin-stats
plugins.description: Extract and display LinkedIn post statistics including impressions, reactions, comments, and reposts. Connects to Arc browser via CDP to read recent activity.

plugins.name: agent-browser
plugins.description: Automates browser interactions for web testing, form filling, screenshots, and data extraction. Use when the user needs to navigate websites, interact with web pages, fill forms, take screenshots, test web applications, or extract information from web pages.

plugins.name: edit-podcast
plugins.description: Clean and improve podcast transcriptions by removing filler words, fixing grammar errors, and applying ASR corrections. Supports both automated cleaning and manual reasoning-based review workflows for TXT and SRT subtitle formats.
